Galaxy Datacache

This server contains a copy of the reference data used on usegalaxy.org. In addition to HTTP, you can access it via multiple other methods:

  • rsync, via rsync://datacache.galaxyproject.org/
  • CernVM-FS (CVMFS), from the Stratum 1 servers:
    • http://cvmfs1-psu0.galaxyproject.org/cvmfs/data.galaxyproject.org/ - Hosted by: Galaxy Project at Penn State University, Pennsylvania, USA
    • http://cvmfs1-iu0.galaxyproject.org/cvmfs/data.galaxyproject.org/ - Hosted by: Galaxy Project via XSEDE on Jetstream Cloud at Indiana University, Indiana, USA
    • http://cvmfs1-tacc0.galaxyproject.org/cvmfs/data.galaxyproject.org/ - Hosted by: Galaxy Project via XSEDE on Jetstream Cloud at Texas Advanced Computing Center, University of Texas at Austin, Texas, USA
    • http://galaxy.jrc.ec.europa.eu:8008/cvmfs/data.galaxyproject.org/ - Hosted by: Joint Research Centre of the European Commission, Ispra, Italy
  • The rsync Data Manager.

Contents

  • /managed - Managed Galaxy Data (created with Galaxy Data Managers)
  • /indexes - Galaxy Genome Indexes (pre-Data Manager manually curated data)
